DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to evaluate the influence of the ageing process on muscle quality. Therefore, muscle mass, muscle density and force-velocity characteristics are measured after a 5-yr interval in older adults (65+).
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Ageing on Muscle Quality
DOC.criteria: male, +65 years participation in previous study "De effecten van oefenprogramma's op gezondheids en fitheidsgerelateerde parameters in een groep van 60plussers" able to perform a maximal strength test on a dynamometer pathologies that prohibit a maximal strength test on a dynamometer
